title: Just ok
text: Lack of extension support/ones that I’ve paid for, washed out ugly gray dark mode, and slow loading times make this very hard to choose over Safari. On windows 11, edge is amazing, but on iOS,it’s just ok. Not ideal but you could just use Safari and use Authenticator for password sync and autofill as a middle ground to get the best of both worlds if you’re on iOS and windows 11.

title: Edge and CoPilot
text: I’ve been a Microsoft client for more than half of my life.  From windows to word to Xbox to devices to Office 365 to Copilot with everything in between and I loyally look forward to the beyond.I don’t typically participate in reviews; I may just assign a star rating and call it a day. When I received the prompt today, I decided to elaborate a bit further.  AI is clearly on the forefront of technological advancement at the moment.  While all or many of the big players in the technology field, have an AI component, CoPilot has been next level phenomenal and truly had a positive impact of my life.  Its current application is already substantial and its future possibilities seem limitless.Is it so well done , so smoothly interfaced, programmed, and executed that I find myself realizing how much, in the midst of any particular topic or conversation, that I enjoy the experience. Kudos to the Microsoft team    I generally appreciate you.Warm regards,Dan
